mapper.select: select date_format(slide_list.last_scan_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, truncate(sum(slide_list.file_size/storage_list.total * 100),2)as used, basefolder_list.storage_name as storage_name, sum(truncate(sum(slide_list.file_size/storage_list.total * 100),2)) over (partition by storage_list.storage_name order by slide_list.last_scan_date) as daily_used from slide_list, basefolder_list,storage_list where slide_list.hupax_basefolder_name = basefolder_list.basefolder_name and basefolder_list.storage_name = storage_list.storage_name group by date, storage_name order by date asc
select * from storage_table where storage_name = #{storageName} order by date asc
